name: Corpse Mound
description: The Corpse Mound is a grotesque combination of bodies piled together, exuding a repulsive aura and an overwhelming presence. It can absorb corpses to regain health and has a noxious aura that poisons nearby foes.
memorable: It can reclaim health by absorbing fallen creatures and can create zombies from corpses nearby.
goals: To absorb corpses and create zombies, dominating the battlefield.
relations: Can be encountered with other undead creatures; it controls zombies.
environment: Thrives in locations with many fallen creatures or battlefields.
strengths: Significant hit points, ability to heal from absorbed creatures, and capable of creating additional threats in combat.
weaknesses: Low mental capabilities, making it less effective in strategic combat situations.
attacks: Multiattack allows it to strike with powerful Slam or Bone Shard attacks, grappling foes and causing bludgeoning and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Absorb the Dead allows the Corpse Mound to regain health whenever a creature dies nearby, adding to its resilience.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and conditions like charm and fear.
Can create up to ten zombies under its control.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
test_queries: massive undead creature with toxic aura
creature that absorbs fallen bodies for health
huge monster with multiple melee attacks
